dmca.title: Texturama complains of blogged copies
dmca.body:
Massive copyright infringement on a new Blogspot page: what can I say, everything here is obviously pirated, and is updated frequently.

http://orscella.blogspot.com/2008/05/1000-seamless-tiling-textures-by.html

These people even have a "Donate" button to Paypal... maybe you can track this with Paypal, and target his financial information to hold him responsible?

This pirate is hosting the files on rapidshare.com. Optimally the files would be removed from Rapidshare as well. Do you have the connections with Rapidshare to do this?

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials as described above is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

[private]
[signature]
May 12, 2008

[private], Partner

Palo Alto, CA 94301
